DOC.HEADLINE: METROPOLITAN DIGEST / LOS ANGELES COUNTY NEWS IN BRIEF : SIMI VALLEY ; SCHOOLS MAY ACQUIRE ENERGY-SAVING BUSES
DOC.TEXT: The Simi Valley Unified School District hopes to receive up_to 10 energy-efficient school_buses by participating in a statewide program that is demonstrating the new environmentally-friendly vehicles . District officials have recommended that the school_board pay a consultant $ 3 # 300 to write a grant proposal to the California Energy Commission to get the new buses . The board will vote on the expenditure at tonight ' s meeting . The new buses would be a major boost for the school district ' s transportation fleet , which has deteriorated in recent years . Last month , the school_board approved spending $ 259 # 000 to purchase several badly needed vehicles . In the last year , four school_buses , seven maintenance vehicles and a delivery_truck have been taken_out of the fleet because they are beyond repair , a district report said .
